trackinfo.title: monologue
trackinfo.lyrics: so soft  so steeply becoming a necessity i shiver in the night  desperate to touch hidden spaces desperate too
trackinfo.credits: from ...and still it flutters, released April 10, 2025

trackinfo.title: light on surface
trackinfo.lyrics: i notice your hands dance out of the time with the song on your voice barely holding itself against collapsing riverbed i notice every detail in how they bend and fold and recoil and hold and linger how they shimmer under any time of day under any type of light i notice how your voice pronounces certain words how the pitch spasms around clingy intention still as clingy as i know i could listen to you forever please sing to me forever
trackinfo.credits: from ...and still it flutters, released April 10, 2025

trackinfo.title: sueñas lo mismo
trackinfo.lyrics: you are everything I wish in my hands you are everything I dream you are everything I see dream of me  you do do you? you do estás en todas partes desde el tiempo impregnándose sobre las paredes recuento de memoria tus manos meticulosamente cayéndose sobre mis ojos  todo lo que persigo ver soñando contigo hasta ahora resembla una sombra de memoria  mis ojos te persiguen mis ojos te persiguen en todas partes todas partes resonando una lenta mirada  retorciendo en pleno deseo me he quedado con todo  todo el deseo y nada de las flores la miel de tus ojos por favor sueña conmigo
trackinfo.credits: from ...and still it flutters, released April 10, 2025

trackinfo.title: rainwalk
trackinfo.lyrics: I wish the light in the morning sounded like your warmth again I wish there were trust trust is so easy so warm and so genuine and still so painful to reach
trackinfo.credits: from ...and still it flutters, released April 10, 2025

trackinfo.title: feralbodymorningsun
trackinfo.lyrics: the sun rains against open space enclosed just a few infinite words above our heads the warmth of summer melts away our grasp on time only humid memories  touching as softly as feral light and it’s clenched jaw on your arm shut so tight we can hardly speak yet I can read the flutter on your lips  it dances too in my eyes i want to be your mirror
trackinfo.credits: from ...and still it flutters, released April 10, 2025

trackinfo.title: I am encircled by spring flowers

life.title: demo eight
life.credits:
released June 11, 2025
additional vocals on “untitled four” by Moongazer

trackinfo.title: I saw you in my dream last night
you feel like the pink sounds that make me cry
perfect kiss
trackinfo.lyrics: It’s so pretty  the middle of May under the sun  it smells like the first youthful kisses do you see how they’re begging on my skin? I carve your initials in the trees my name is included In how much I repeat the sounds the sounds I fall in love with  and make me cry resonant on tearful eyes  i wrote journals about you  they’re still in my childhood bedroom  they’re still at the thickest veins in my wrist and the quietest moments between somewhere anywhere it’s perfect because it’s you

life.title: demo six
life.about:
additional vocals on track 2 by  www.instagram.com/emoviolenza/
Amaliia Balikhina

trackinfo.title: everything for your hands in autumn
trackinfo.lyrics: how do you sleep so soft? im waiting for you at the edge of my window  hoping the rain doesnt stop before i see you again everything for your hands in autumn and burning memory painted endlessly along every wall

trackinfo.title: three years
trackinfo.lyrics: three years to carry with me forever do you ? how did you know how to touch it not even myself pulsing against the mirror towards the distance can i you do

trackinfo.title: sunset at the hill
trackinfo.lyrics: when all the moments come together in one spot  softly holding onto my pulsing heart it feels again like my dreams  watching the clouds fall into orange pink orange and blue and as if they knew all the perfect colors to be just to spell the names of my memories memories here and there I miss something so much that I wish to hold I don’t want to miss it  I don’t want to close my eyes too long I don’t want you to slip away I don’t want your touch to fade you feel like soft spring air you feel like the slowly falling sun you feel like the first flowers of the year you feel like the eversetting sun i wish I didn’t have to miss you  i wish i could share everything  it hurts to only remember i wish for your hand in mine just one last time  to last forever

life.title: demo ten
life.about: additional vocals on tracks 1 & 2 by Amalia  www.instagram.com/emoviolenza/

trackinfo.title: an exchanging of soft gestures
trackinfo.lyrics: soft body Warm color intentions coalescing into a single moment only slightly asymmetrical reminds me of nature embodied of you An exchanging of soft gestures hugged like the gentle late spring memory we cross paths entwined towards the stars  I write fire on the walls fire as a metaphor decorated space  decorated body  your words are decorated sounds  home built with your hands

life.title: my heart the dreaming memory
life.about: vocals on tracks 1,3,4,5,6, and 7 by life and  www.instagram.com/emoviolenza/

trackinfo.title: her eyes the burning song
trackinfo.lyrics: my body is the chilly air her hands the cloud eclipsed sun her eyes the burning song my heart the dreaming memory the simmer of her goodbye falls like snow  it singes like shuttering midnight leavelessness somehow your voice sounds cold like early morning dew and I know you’ll be buried when winter comes  I wish I didn’t have to know
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: mesa
trackinfo.lyrics: detalles en el recuento, corriente sobre las paredes, la luz es efímera, hablamos de tratos y confianza y todavía nos ilusiona el lento atardecer. son las 8 de la noche y ya te tienes que ir  así cada día
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: in helpless gesture
trackinfo.lyrics: growing distant i gesture towards the same path we held hands empty hand crying towards the ground i want to lift i want to lift please lift your absence off of my chest please lift my name to the top of your throat please hold my hand
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: cold channel
trackinfo.lyrics: in a furled memory you pronounce laughter and you shimmer like blue moonlight  all our memories strewn over the same space motionless in time entwined yet never to hold eachother  there’s a desperate sound beating against the surface  they know they’re there but can’t
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: untitled two
trackinfo.lyrics: elusive snow  glistening on a shimmering screen words hidden in fragments melt as they kiss the river and it’s for their edges carved in my veins  that I know your name suspending over the back of my ear like fingers in desperate quivering love  yet somehow as still as slowly rippling warm hands in winter water  how does a still image flutter so much your name is written everywhere
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: how i learned to speak
trackinfo.lyrics: is it enough  the only interaction between me and distant lights is hoping somehow that they’re making eye contact with me i hope I am the night sky  i hope I am the glistening window  as big as the entire story  as much of your world as this whole room is it enough that you’re my whole world  is it enough that I can’t stop staring at you  is it enough that it hurts me so much is it enough that
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: let me be everything
trackinfo.lyrics: the sound of a hurting voice pulsing against an impatient surface a heart full of things that aren’t mine in my dreams a bed that has never been laid in it writes selfish words along its open hands  open to give everything  my eyes have been wide open hoping to find a glimpse of you returning hurting voice and an impatient body impatient to be seen impatient to be held like the twirling leaves that dance their way to your feet motionless naked in autumn rain I try to match the pitch of your skin and that’s every sound of everything given it’s all for you but it’s really for me it’s all for me but it’s really for you
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025

trackinfo.title: if i could
trackinfo.lyrics: once again I see you in my dreams again and again I’m given the last moments I’ll ever see you  and never knowing they’re the end you know id spend them in the perfect way if I only knew you know I would you know I’d become every word I’ve ever said as if no one’s listening as if for the first time I discovered  just how much do you know just how much? just how much
trackinfo.credits: from my heart the dreaming memory, released April 24, 2025
